GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange Active Sync), Excel, Word, Power Point, OneNote, Adobe Reader, Outlook
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Speed Dialing, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: User Guide, Handset, Nokia Stereo Headset WH-108, Charger, Battery

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports AAC-LC, GSM FR, AMR-NB
Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Integrated Hands-free Speakers, Album Graphics Display in Music Player, Cloud Music Offline Playback, Cloud Music Playback, Podcasts, Noise Cancellation
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports MPEG4, MP4, H.264, VC-1, H.263, AVC, H.264

Camera.Other Camera Features: Fixed Focus, Sensor Size: 1/4-inch, f-number/aperture: f/2.4, Focal Length: 28 mm, Focus Range: 60 cm

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (HFP 1.6, OPP 1.1, AVRCP 1.4, GATT, A2DP 1.2, PBAP 1.1)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, GLONASS, with HERE Drive+, HERE Maps, Bing Maps

Other Features.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Orientation Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Refresh Rate 60 Hz, RGB Stripe, Brightness Control, Tactile Feedback, Easy to Clean, Multi-point Touch, Color Boosting
